issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.customfield_12310192: Added init.d script for jobhistory server and secondary namenode. (Eric Yang)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The current set of init.d scripts can start/stop process for:

namenode
datanode
jobtracker
tasktracker

It is missing init.d scripts for:

secondarynamenode
jobhistory
fields.summary: jobhistory server and secondarynamenode should have init.d script

comments.body: Added init.d script for branch-20-security
Updated patch for branch-20-security branch.
Updated secondary namenode and history server init.d script for trunk.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12496614/HADOOP-7684-trunk.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/235//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/235//console

This message is automatically generated.
Eric, 0.23 has RM, NM & MR JobHistoryServer...

- Updated the trunk version to match yarn-daemon.sh.  
- Added script for node manager and resource manager.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12496762/HADOOP-7684-trunk-1.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/236//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/236//console

This message is automatically generated.

rpm package doesnt seem to include the historyserver and secondarynamenode init scripts.

looks like hadoop-historyserver and hadoop-secondarynamnode init.d script should be added to the list of init.d scripts in the spec file.
Updated patch to include changes in .spec file for 20-security branch.
Updated trunk to reflect changes required in rpm spec file.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12496841/HADOOP-7684-trunk-2.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/241//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/241//console

This message is automatically generated.

Committed to 0.20-security and 0.20.205.
Thanks, Eric!

+1 verified the patch with rpm installation on a single node cluster.

singlenode setup script requires a fix to create the required mapred dirs in the hdfs fs. Will file a separate jira for that. filed jira - HADOOP-7692

deb pkg installation fails on ubuntu as the groupid 114 is used by gdm. jira: HADOOP-7691
I just committed this to trunk and branch 0.23, thanks Matt and Giri.

secondary namenode. (Eric Yang)
